name: Simple Todo List
description: A basic todo list application to manage tasks
functional_requirements: Users can create new todos with title and optional description via POST /api/todos
Users can view all todos and filter by status (all/active/completed) via GET /api/todos and GET /api/todos/filter
Users can mark todos as completed or uncompleted and edit title/description via PUT /api/todos/{todo_id}
Users can delete todos via DELETE /api/todos/{todo_id} with confirmation dialog
stylistic_requirements: Use React hooks (useState, useEffect) for state management and API calls
Display loading states during all API operations with clear visual feedback
Implement proper error handling with user-friendly error messages for all API failures
Ensure accessibility with semantic HTML, ARIA labels, and keyboard navigation support

control_endpoints.description: Health check endpoint for monitoring backend availability
API status endpoint returning service information
